createEndpoint.name: createEndpoint
createEndpoint.description: Creates a new language generation endpoint.

getEndpoints.name: getEndpoints
getEndpoints.description: Gets all language generation endpoint of a subscription.

updateEndpoint.name: updateEndpoint

params.name: id
params.description: The identifier of the language generation model endpoint.

updateEndpoint.description: Updates the mutable details of the language generation endpoint identified by its id.

deleteEndpoint.name: deleteEndpoint

params.name: id
params.description: The identifier of the language generation model endpoint.

deleteEndpoint.description: Deletes the language generation model endpoint with the given id.

getEndpoint.name: getEndpoint
getEndpoint.description: Gets the specified deployed language generation endpoint.

getSupportedLocalesForEndpoints.name: getSupportedLocalesForEndpoints
getSupportedLocalesForEndpoints.description: Gets a list of supported locales for language generation endpoint creation.

getSupportedLocalesForModels.name: getSupportedLocalesForModels
getSupportedLocalesForModels.description: Gets a list of supported locales for language generation model creation.

createModel.name: createModel

params.name: in
params.description: Path to lg file or folder containing lg files

createModel.description: Creates a new language generation model.

getModels.name: getModels
getModels.description: Gets all language generation model of a subscription.

updateModel.name: updateModel

params.name: id
params.description: The route parameter identifies the language generation model to change.

updateModel.description: Updates the mutable details of the language generation model identified by its id.

deleteModel.name: deleteModel

params.name: id
params.description: The identifier of the language generation model.

deleteModel.description: Deletes the language generation model with the given id.

getModel.name: getModel
getModel.description: Gets the specified language generation model.

replaceModel.name: createModel

params.name: lg
params.description: Path to lg file or folder containing lg files

replaceModel.description: Creates a new language generation model with same properties as existing model with specified id
